tuv.seg: Overview of the Irish education system
Forléargas ar chóras oideachais na hÉireann
Education is compulsory for children in Ireland from the ages of six to 16 or until students have completed three years of second-level education
Tá oideachas éigeantach do leanaí in Éirinn ó aoiseanna a sé go 16 nó go dtí go bhfuil trí bliana d'oideachas dara leibhéal comhlánaithe ag mic léinn
The Irish education system is made up of primary, second, third-level and further education
Tá córas oideachais na hÉireann déanta suas den bhunscolaíocht, dara leibhéal, tríú leibhéal agus breisoideachas
State-funded education is available at all levels, unless you choose to send your child to a private institution
Tá oideachas atá maoinithe ag an Stát ar fáil ag gach leibhéal, mura roghnaíonn tú do leanbh a chur chuig institiúid phríobháideach
The Early Childhood Care and Education (ECCE) Scheme provides a free year of early childhood care and education for children of pre-school age
Is gnách gur áiseanna nó soláthraithe cúram leanaí atá maoinithe go príobháideach a sholáthraíonn oideachas réamhscolaíochta
Some pre-school initiatives focused on children at risk are funded by the Department of Education and Skills
Tá tionscnaimh áirithe a dhíríonn ar leanaí i bpriacal atá maoinithe ag an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna
Children do not have to attend school until the age of six but it is usual for children to begin school the September following their fourth birthday
Ní gá do leanaí freastal a dhéanamh ar an scoil go dtí aois a sé, ach is iondúil do leanaí an scoil a thosú i Meán Fómhair tar éis dóibh an ceathrú lá breithe a shlánú
Four-year-olds and five-year-olds are enrolled in the junior or senior infant classes
Tá leanaí ceithre bliana agus cúig bliana rollaithe i ranganna na naíonán beag agus mór
The curriculum for primary education covers the following key areas:
Clúdaíonn curaclam na bunscoile na réimsí tábhachtacha a leanas:
Language, mathematics, social, environment and scientific education, arts education including visual arts music and drama, physical integration, social personal and health education

Teanga, matamaitic, oideachas sóisialta, comhshaoil agus eolaíochta, oideachas ealaíon a chuimsíonn na hamharcealaíona, ceol agus drámaíocht, comtháthú fisiciúil, oideachas sóisialta, pearsanta agus sláinte
Primary schools are generally privately owned by religious communities (or boards of governors) but are State-funded
Tá bunscoileanna faoi úinéireacht phríobháideach go ginearálta ag pobail eaglasta (nó boird ghobharnóirí) ach tá siad maoinithe ag an Stát
Second-level education is provided by different types of post-primary schools
Tá oideachas dara leibhéal soláthraithe ag cineálacha éagsúla iarbhunscoileanna
That is, secondary, vocational, community and comprehensive schools
Is iad sin, meánscoileanna, gairmscoileanna, pobalscoileanna agus scoileanna cuimsitheacha
Secondary schools are privately owned and managed
Tá meánscoileanna bainistithe go príobháideach agus faoi úinéireacht phríobháideach
In most cases the trustees are religious communities or boards of governors
I mbeagnach gach cás, is iad pobail eaglasta nó boird ghobharnóirí iad na hiontaobhaithe
Vocational schools are established by the State and administered by vocational education committees
Is é an Stát a bhunaíonn gairmscoileanna agus bíonn siad riartha ag coistí gairmoideachais
Community and comprehensive schools are managed by boards of management of differing compositions
Tá pobalscoileanna agus scoileanna cuimsitheacha á mbainistiú ag boird bhainistíochta de bhallraíochtaí éagsúla

Second-level education consists of a three-year junior cycle followed by a two-year or three-year senior cycle depending on whether an optional Transition Year is taken following the Junior Certificate examination

Cuimsíonn oideachas dara leibhéal sraith shóisearach trí bliana agus sraith shinsearach dhá bhliain nó trí bliana ag brath ar cibé an dtógtar nó nach dtógtar an Idirbhliain roghnach tar éis scrúdú an Teastais Shóisearaigh
Students generally commence the junior cycle at the age of 12
Tosaíonn mic léinn ar an tsraith shóisearach ag aois 12 de ghnáth
The Junior Certificate is taken after three years
Suítear an Teastas Sóisearach tar éis trí bliana
Transition Year follows the Junior Certificate examination
Leanann an Idirbhliain scrúdú an Teastais Shóisearaigh
This year is free from formal examinations and allows students to experience a wide range of educational inputs, including work experience
Tá an bhliain seo saor ó scrúduithe foirmeálta agus ceadaítear do mhic léinn taithí a fháil ar réimse leathan d'ionchuir oideachasúla, taithí oibre san áireamh

During their final two years in the senior cycle, students take one of three programmes, each leading to a State examination - the established Leaving Certificate, the Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme or the Leaving Certificate Applied

Le linn an dá bhliain deiridh den tsraith shinsearach, tógann mic léinn ceann amháin de thrí chlár, gach ceann acu a chríochnaíonn le scrúdú Stáit - an Ardteistiméireacht bhunaithe, Gairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta nó an Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach
The established Leaving Certificate is the main basis upon which places in universities, institutes of technology and colleges of education are allocated
Is í an Ard-Teistiméireacht bhunaithe an príomhbhunús ar a ndáiltear áiteanna in ollscoileanna, institiúidí teicneolaíochta agus coláistí oideachais

The Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme differs from the established Leaving Certificate in placing a concentration on technical subjects and including additional modules which have a vocational focus
Tá Gairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta difriúil ón Ardteistiméireacht bhunaithe sa mhéid agus go ndírítear ar ábhair theicniúla agus modúil bhreise le fócas gairme acu
The Leaving Certificate Applied Programme has as its primary objective the preparation of participants for adult and working life through relevant learning experiences
Tá sé mar phríomhchuspóir ag an Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach na rannpháirtithe a ullmhú don saol oibre agus saol an aosaigh trí thaithí foghlama ábhartha
These aim to develop the following areas of human endeavour: spiritual, intellectual, social, emotional, aesthetic and physical
Tá sé mar chuspóir acu seo na réimsí a leanas i gcomhdhéanamh an duine a fhorbairt: spioradálta, intleachtúil, sóisialta, mothúchánach, aeistéitiúil agus fisiciúil
The Leaving Certificate Applied is not recognised for direct entry to third-level courses but it can enable students to take Post-Leaving Certificate courses
Níl an Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach aitheanta d'iontráil dhíreach go dtí cúrsaí tríú leibhéal, ach is féidir a chur ar chumas mic léinn cúrsaí iar-Ardteistiméireachta a thógáil
Third-level education is made up of a number of sectors
Tá oideachas tríú leibhéal déanta suas de roinnt rannóg
The university sector, the technological sector and the colleges of education are substantially funded by the State
Tá maoiniú substaintiúil ón Stát ag rannóg na n-ollscoileanna, rannóg na teicneolaíochta agus ag na coláistí oideachais
In addition there are a number of independent private colleges
Ina theannta sin, tá líon áirithe coláistí neamhspleácha atá príobháideach
There are seven universities, which are autonomous and self-governing
Tá seacht n-ollscoil ann agus tá siad uathrialach agus féinrialaitheach
They offer degree programmes at bachelor, masters and doctorate level
Déanann siad cláir chéime a thairiscint ag leibhéal baitsiléara, máistreachta agus dochtúireachta

The technological sector includes institutes of technology which provide programmes of education and training in areas such as business, science, engineering, linguistics and music to certificate, diploma and degree levels

Cuimsíonn rannóg na teicneolaíochta institiúidí teicneolaíochta a sholáthraíonn cláir oideachais agus oiliúna i réimsí cosúil le gnó, eolaíocht, innealtóireacht, teangeolaíocht agus ceol go leibhéal teastais, dioplóma agus céime
The Department of Education and Skills has overall responsibility for the sector
Tá freagracht fhoriomlán ar an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna don rannóg
The colleges of education specialise in training for first-level teachers
Déanann coláistí oideachais speisialú in oiliúint do mhúinteoirí céadleibhéil
They offer a three-year bachelor of education degree and a postgraduate diploma
Déanann siad céim trí bliana don Bhaitsiléir san Oideachas agus dioplóma iarchéime 18 mí a thairiscint
The training of second-level teachers usually involves completing a primary degree in university or other third-level institution followed by a one-year higher diploma in education

Go hiondúil, maidir le hoiliúint na múinteoirí dara leibhéal, caithfidh bunchéim a bheith comhlánaithe acu in ollscoil nó institiúid tríú leibhéal eile, agus ard-dioplóma bliana san oideachas ina dhiaidh sin
In addition, there are colleges of education that specialise in the training of second-level home economics teachers, teachers of religion and physical education
Ina theannta sin, tá coláistí oideachais ann a dhéanann speisialú in oiliúint do mhúinteoirí dara leibhéal san eacnamaíocht bhaile, sa reiligiún agus sa chorpoideachas
Further and adult education
Breisoideachas agus oideachas aosach
Further education comprises education and training which takes place after second-level schooling but which is not part of the third-level system
Cuimsíonn breisoideachas oideachas agus oiliúint a tharlaíonn tar éis na scolaíochta dara leibhéal, ach nach bhfuil mar chuid den chóras tríú leibhéal

It includes programmes such as Post-Leaving Certificate courses; the Vocational Training Opportunities Scheme (second-chance education for the unemployed); programmes in Youthreach for early school-leavers; other literacy and basic education; and self-funded evening adult programmes in second-level schools

Cuimsíonn sé cláir cosúil le cúrsaí iar-Ardteistiméireachta; an Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna Gairmoideachais (oideachas athdheise do dhaoine dífhostaithe); cláir in Ógtheagmháil do luathfhágálaithe scoile; oideachas bunúsach agus litearthachta; agus cláir um thráthnóna d'aosaigh i scoileanna dara leibhéal
Special needs education for students with disabilities
Oideachas riachtanais speisialta do mhic léinn atá faoi mhíchumas
Educational provision for students with special educational needs ranges from additional support in mainstream schools to specialist support in special schools
Réimsíonn soláthar oideachasúil do mhic léinn le riachtanais speisialta oideachais ó thacaíocht bhreise sna scoileanna príomhshrutha go tacaíocht speisialaithe sna scoileanna speisialta
A student with a disability may be enrolled in a:
Is féidir mac léinn atá faoi mhíchumas a chlárú i:
• Mainstream class with additional support
• Rang príomhshrutha le tacaíocht bhreise
• Special class in a mainstream school or
• Rang speisialta i scoil príomhshrutha nó
• Special school which caters for the students with his or her category of disability
• Scoil speisialta a fhreastalaíonn ar mhic léinn lena c(h)atagóir mhíchumais
